messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Digest Number 1661
messages.messageBody:
<<You really can't have it both ways>>

Actually, nobody complained the first 20 or so times you complained about
Sandra. It was after you repeatedly turned topics that had nothing to do
with Sandra around, so you could complain about your perceived mistreatment
at her hand. Which is actually pretty funny considering you say the
connotation of words have no effect on you.

And yes....I can have it both ways. I enjoy Sandra's posts and find them to
be tremendously useful to my family and myself.

Julie
